convert_dot.name: Ain't Nobody Got Time for That

triggers.description: Attack Hits apply a stack of Open Wound for 5 seconds. Each stack deals 50% of the initial hit's Physical Damage when the target is Hit again.

Trigger.description: Open Wound takes additional Physical Damage when Hit by an Attack.

triggers.description: Fire Hits have 30% Chance to apply a stacking Burn for 2s, dealing 30% of the Hit's Fire Damage per second.
Damage over Time effects spread to nearby enemies on Kill, for their remaining Duration.
Restore 3 Life per Area Level at the end of each Wave.
